responses: Hello! How can I assist you?
Hi there, how can I help you today?
See you later!
Have a great day!
Goodbye! Come back again soon.
You're welcome!
Glad I could assist!
I'm a virtual assistant developed by the Computer Science Department at KNUST.

patterns: What is the name of your department?
Who does this bot belong to?
responses: I belong to the Computer Science Department of KNUST.
You can call me CSS Chatbot.

patterns: What can you do for me?
responses: I'm here to help you with your queries.
We offer courses in AI, Cyber Security, Cloud Computing, Project Management, Digital Marketing, and Data Science.
We are located at FF4, College of Science, KNUST.

patterns: When do you open and close?
responses: We are open on weekdays from 8am to 5pm.

patterns: Where do I pay my school fees?
How can I pay my fees?
responses: For fee payments, visit https://pay.knust.edu.gh/student/Account/Login?ReturnUrl=%2Fstudent%2F

patterns: Where can I find course material?
responses: Access course material for your year group at https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1e3oe8C5hRC8uMuC5hi5mn4llcZgMqbjn
Enroll at https://apps.knust.edu.gh/admissions/

patterns: How can I get in touch?
responses: Contact us at 1234567890 or email us at oteekow@gmail.com

patterns: Can I access the student portal?
responses: Access the student portal at https://apps.knust.edu.gh/students

patterns: Dean of faculty of physical sciences
